list_definition.mean_english: tình trạng không thích hợp, không hoạt động như mong đợi
list_definition.definition: the state or act of failing

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She was upset by her failure in the exam

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I was disappointed by his failure to reply.
